pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pytest_yamlThis plugin is used to load yaml output to your test using pytest framework.## How to install```bashpip install pytest_yaml```## How to use#### Example code```yamlparam: "value"``````pythondef test_hello(yaml_content): assert yaml_content['param'] == 'value', 'your message'```#### Command line```bashpytest ./tests/sample/ --yaml-file ./yaml/sample.yml```
